0.title: Undefined error
0.message: Something went wrong but we don't know what? Ah shit.

1.title: Twitter login url is not valid
1.group: Twitter login url is not valid
1.message: We could not get the correct twitter login url.

2.title: Invalid error code
2.message: An error code was specified but does not corresppond to a valid error.

3.title: The callback did not recieve valid parameters
3.message: The twitter callback was called but did not have any valid authentication parameters.

4.title: There was an error exchanging tokens with Twitter
4.message: We could not get a valid response from Twitter to authenticate the user.

6.title: Twitter did not respond with the correct information
6.message: This shouldn't happen, could be to do with Twitter's API changing?.

7.title: No Twitter ID was specified for the user

7.message: This shouldn't happen, Someone didn't write the code properly.

8.title: We found multiple users with this Twitter ID
8.group: Could not check if user is registered
8.message: This shouldn't happen, we buggered up the database.

9.title: No paramaters were passed to the method
9.message: This shouldn't happen, we made sloppy code.
